name: Mp-and-friends
tagline: Who are your MP's commercial friends?
body:
### MP & Friends

Data on MPs and registered UK companies from [OpenCorporates](https://opencorporates.com/) has been combined to create list the company directorships of every MP and the names of every co-director of those companies.

The data is presented as a 'Friends' graph linking each MP to their companies and the directors of those companies.

Team members:

[Tom Paskhalis](https://github.com/tpaskhalis)

[qqq](https://github.com/sharechiwai)

[qqq](https://github.com/daeus)

[Derek Jones](http://shape-of-code.coding-guidelines.com/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
